name: assistant teacher child care early childhood education
location: The Goddard School of Fairfield (Little Falls Road), Fairfield, NJ 07004
description: They are looking for part time & full assistant teachers to join our team today to work          in all of our age groups from Pre K to infants in a support role in a position called All         School Assistant.
benefits: Continuing education credits                                                                      Dental insurance                                                                                  Food provided                                                                                     Health insurance                                                                                  Opportunities for advancement                                                                     Paid time off                                                                                     Paid training                                                                                     Tuition reimbursement
requirements: Experience working with children under the age of 5 in a large group environment.Post  high school education is a plus! Shows empathy and compassion for young children. Is              dependable and adaptable and enjoys working together toward a common goal. Must be able           to lift up to 50 lbs. In connection with the handling of children for the facilitation            of programs, child safety, and potential emergency situations. For Infant and Young               Toddler Teachers, must be able to properly lift infants into and out of a crib.

name: Life guard
description: Maintains safe swimming conditions in the pool, deck, and surrounding areas. Creates a           safe and positive atmosphere that promotes member safety and engagement in accordance             with YMCA policies and procedures. Lifeguard hours are needed during all open hours of            the facility, weekdays 5am-10pm and weekends 7am-7pm.
requirements:
Minimum age of 16. 
 Certifications: CPR for the Professional Rescuer, AED and Basic First Aid. 
 Current Red Cross or YMCA Lifeguard certification. 
 Ability to maintain certification-level of physical and mental readiness. 
 Must demonstrate lifeguard skills in accordance with YMCA standards. 
 Hear noises and distress signals in the aquatic environment, including in the water and anywhere around the zone of responsibility. 
 Remain alert with no lapses of consciousness. 
 See and observe all sections of an assigned zone or area of responsibility.

name: Sales Associate/Stock (Adidas)
benefits:
Employee discount 
 Flexible schedule 
 Paid time off 
 Tuition reimbursement
requirements:
Availability must be flexible and include evenings and weekends. 
 Hours are part time and will vary based on business needs. 
 You must have or be pursuing a high school diploma or general education degree (GED). 
 Three to six month’s experience working in a retail environment preferred. 
 Basic numeracy, literacy, and verbal communication skills required. 
 Must be 16 years of age or older. 
 While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. 
 The employee frequently is required to stand; walk; use hands to finger, handle, or feel; and reach with hands and arms. 
 The employee is occasionally required to sit; climb or balance; and stoop, kneel, crouch, crawl, and operate a Brannock device. 
 The employee must frequently lift and/or move up to 25 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 50 pounds. 
 Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, and ability to adjust focus.

name: Rutgers Parking Attendant
description:
RU Big Ten Football 
 Parking Attendants/Cashiers Needed! 
 Part-time, Overtime after 40 hours 
 Kick the Football season off by working at the birthplace of college football in Piscataway, NJ, and earn an extra paycheck.
requirements:
Must have the ability to communicate effectively with great customer service skills. 
 Must be able to work in a variety of weather. 
 Must be able to do simple math if cashier. 
 Greet all patrons attending all football games. 
 Must wear a proper uniform (i.e. Plain White Polo, with Khaki pants). 
 Screen for various parking passes.

name: Program Assistant - Birthday Parties
description: We are an all - inclusive organization joined together by a shared commitment to nurturing the potential of kids, promoting healthy living and fostering a sense of social responsibility. As a growing, mission focused, and future-oriented association of YMCAs, the Metro YMCA of the Oranges has an exciting opportunity for a highly motivated, mission-driven, candidate to join our team.
pay: Not given by site. Must ask in person.
requirements:
High school student or equivalent. 
 Previous experience working with children. 
 At least 15 years of age. 
 Previous experience with diverse populations preferred.

name: Tropical Smoothie Café Crew Member
description:
Responsibilities: 
 Deliver the Ultimate Guest service experience! 
 Prepare orders in a timely and accurate manner. 
 Work well with crew members and managers.
benefits:
Employee discount 
 Flexible schedule 
 Opportunities for advancement
requirements:
Follow the highest food safety standards and regulations 
 Train quickly and work efficiently 
 Previous quick serve or restaurant experience a plus 
 Flexible availability 
 Rotating weekend shifts are required 
 16 years and older

name: Hospitality Team Member Evening part-time(Chick-fil-A)
description: As a Front of House (Hospitality) Team Member, you will welcome & greet guests, take customer orders at either the front counter or drive-thru, prepare beverages & desserts, assemble and serve orders, maintain cleanliness, observe health and sanitation guidelines, and ensure each guest leaves with a smile! We are looking for friendly, enthusiastic people who enjoy serving customers. We will teach you everything else you need to know! Successful Team Members will conduct themselves with a positive attitude and impeccable character, demonstrating REMARKable hospitality service to every guest who visits our restaurant.
benefits:
401(k) matching 
 Employee discount 
 Flexible schedule 
 Health insurance 
 Leadership training provided
requirements:
Must be at least 16 years of age upon hire date 
 Must be eligible to work in the United States 
 Must have a source of reliable transportation 
 Ability to handle all equipment, navigating shelving both high and low 
 Reading, writing, and basic math and verbal communication skills required 
 Works in hot, noisy and fast paced environment 
 Mobility required during shifts 
 Must work well under pressure 
 Must be able to respond to changes or edits to orders quickly and efficiently 
 Must be available a minimum of 20 hours per week, ability to close until 10:45pm, Mon-Sat, with at least 2 Saturday evenings per month.

name: Student Aide
description: The F.M. Kirby Children's Center of the Madison Area YMCA is looking for part-time Student Aides to work in our classrooms. Student Aides assist classroom teachers to implement the Center's development program, maintain classroom and joint-use space, and assist in supervising and engaging with the children.
requirements:
Minimum of 14 years old. 
 Must be able to work well with young children, parents, and staff and display strong customer service-related skills. 
 Be certified (or agree to be trained) in CPR, First Aid, AED & oxygen certifications.

name: Philly Pretzel Factory
description:
Looking to Hire Awesome People 
 Need General Helpers. 
 Earn $15 to $ 18 an hour! 
 INCLUDING BONUSES & GREAT TIPS! 
 Hiring Full Timers First. 
 MUST BE 16 OR OLDER TO APPLY! 
 For IMMEDIATE CONSIDERATION stop into the Philly Pretzel Factory. Located at 3051 Rt 35 Hazlet NJ 07730 
 If you feel your Responsible and Reliable, we want to WORK WITH YOU!!! 
 Please apply in Person. 3051 Rt 35 Hazlet NJ 07730
